Module lanat
Package lanat.helpRepresentation.descriptions

Class DescriptionFormatter

java.lang.Object
lanat.helpRepresentation.descriptions.DescriptionFormatter
public final class DescriptionFormatter extends Object
A class that parses tags in a description and replaces them with the content generated by them.

A tag is a substring of the description that starts with a < character and ends with a > character. See Tag for more information on tags.

Custom tags may be created by extending the Tag class and registering them with the Tag.register(String, Class) method.

See Also:
  • Tag

    • parse

      @Nullable public static <T extends CommandUser & NamedWithDescription> @Nullable String parse(@NotNull T element)
      Parses the description of the given user and replaces all tags with the content generated by them. The description is taken from the given user by calling NamedWithDescription.getDescription().
      Type Parameters:
      T - the type of the user
      Parameters:
      element - the user whose description is being parsed
      Returns:
      the parsed description, or null if the user has no description
      See Also:
      • parse(NamedWithDescription, String)
